text: Mary McAllister, also known as Little Mary McAllister, (born Mary McAlister; May 27, 1908 â€“ May 1, 1991) was an American silent film actress of Hollywood, and a pioneer of child actors. McAllister was born in Los Angeles, California. She started her acting career at the early age of 6. == References == Category:American silent movie actors Category:1908 births Category:1991 deaths
title: Mary McAllister
